effect_entries.effect: Raises the holder’s Special Defense to 1.5×.  Prevents the holder from selecting a status move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the holder’s Special Defense to 1.5×.  Prevents the holder from selecting a status move.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.
